summary: This document is an email chain between defense attorney Reid Weingarten and a federal prosecutor (AUSA) regarding the bail hearing in the case U.S. v. Epstein (19 Cr. 490). It discusses scheduling a meeting, coordinating communications, and the filing of the government's reply memorandum opposing bail.

keyFacts: The email chain is centered on the bail proceedings for Jeffrey Epstein in case 19 Cr. 490.
Defense attorney Reid Weingarten is coordinating with prosecutors and plans to meet with Epstein the evening before a hearing.
